programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Supercop (1996) (Miramax), (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Michelle Yeoh, and Maggie Cheung lead an action-packed classic with jaw-dropping stunts, from leaping out a ten-story building onto an airborne helicopter to landing on top of a speeding train.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Night of the Comet, (1984, Thriller)
programme.desc: A huge comet passes near the earth, vaporizing nearly the whole planet. But a few partially exposed people are now blood-thirsty zombies, and they begin a hunt for the remaining humans.

programme.title: The Sword And The Sorcerer, (1982, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

programme.title: Dark Tide, (2012, Action)
programme.desc:
Kate accepts a lucrative opportunity to lead a thrill-seeking millionaire businessman on a shark dive in the most dangerous waters, outside the cage.
PG-13

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: Bug, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A paranoid, unhinged war veteran who sees insects everywhere holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room.

programme.title: Catacombs, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Horror unfolds when a nave American makes her first trip to Paris and is invited to an underground rave party in the city's catacombs.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow, (2020, Werewolves)
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff and his lackluster team of officers must solve a series of brutal murders that are occurring on the full moon. As he's consumed by the hunt for the killer, he struggles to remind himself that there's no such thing as werewolves

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Horror)

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Horror)

programme.desc: Daisy Gamble, a woman who hears phones before they ring wants to quit smoking, to please her fiancee, Warren. She goes to a doctor of hypnosis to do it. But once she's under, her doctor finds out that she can regress into past lives.

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers comedic genius shines when the hapless Inspector Clouseau is presumed to be dead. However, the very much alive Inspector travels to Hong Kong to investigate a dangerous drug lord (Robert Webber). Dyan Cannon and Herbert Lom also star.

programme.title: Bananas, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen's humor is at his wild and bizarre best in this story of a "weird-gadget" tester who, after being jilted by his girlfriend (Louise Lasser), ends up as president of a tiny country where absurdity reigns.

programme.title: Cold Turkey, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dick Van Dyke stars as Clayton Brooks, minister in a small Iowa town, who takes up the challenge presented by an ad exec (Bob Newhart) for a tobacco company: any city or town in America that can give up smoking for 30 days gets $25 million dollars.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS + MORIA / THE MOST HEINOUS COMBINATION OF BRAINS AND BRAWN

programme.title: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET PLAN TO TURN THE TABLES / NIGHTMARE LUFFY MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HAT CREW GETS WIPED OUT / THE SHADOW-SHADOW'S POWERS IN FULL SWING

programme.title: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INCREDIBLE BATTLE STARTS! LUFFY VS. LUFFY

programme.title: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE END OF THE BATTLE IS NIGH! POUND IN THE FINISHING MOVE

programme.title: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OUR BODIES VANISH! THE MORNING SUN SHINES ON THE NIGHTMARISH ISLAND!

programme.title: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NOT OUT OF DANGER YET! ORDERS TO ANNIHILATE THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats battered as they may be refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Spider-Man [Tom Holland] begins to navigate his new identity as the web-slinging superhero under the watchful eye of his mentor Tony Stark.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

programme.title: Gunfight At The O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier lawman Wyatt Earp joins his three brothers in their feud against the villainous Clanton gang, a local clan of cattle thieves in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Cow Town, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Barbed wire is brought to the open range in a secret plan is to bring sheep into the territory, and the ranchers are urged to fight against it. Gene Autry makes certain that nothing shady is going on.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me, (2000, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of the Best Picture and Best Screenplay awards at the 2000 Sundance Film Festival, "You Can Count on Me" has been hailed as "the best American movie this year."*

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me, (2000, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of the Best Picture and Best Screenplay awards at the 2000 Sundance Film Festival, "You Can Count on Me" has been hailed as "the best American movie this year."*

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the schools smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the generals failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moons identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagis school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi decides to take the Princess Seminar course and the other Sailor Guardians join her. This is actually a trap set up by the Dark Kingdom.
programme.sub-title: Let's Become a Princess: Usagi's Bizarre Training

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that its Kunzites plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.
programme.sub-title: The Snow, the Mountains, Friendship and Monsters

programme.title: The Expendables 3, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: After a former associate makes it his mission to end the Expendables, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) assembles a team of younger, tech-savvy recruits to help take down their enemy.

programme.title: Rogue, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A cynical American travel writer is among the stranded riverboat passengers who become fodder for a monstrous crocodile.

programme.title: The Expendables, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A mercenary (Sylvester Stallone) and his men learn that their assignment to overthrow a South American dictator is a suicide mission.

programme.title: The Expendables 2, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Mercenary Barney Ross and his team cut a swath of destruction through opposing forces as they take revenge for the vicious murder of a comrade.

programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: O Justiceiro

programme.title: Tyson rapidamente perde sua batalha com Kai. Andrew e Kenny informam que os Blade Sharks esto procurando o melhor Bit Beast que ningum pode vencer. Andrew, Kenny e Tyson reconstroem o Bey de Tyson.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E3

programme.title: O torneio regional de qualificao da Beyblade comea quando Tyson, Max e at Kenny entram para ver se conseguem destronar Kai, o atual campeo. Max ganha seu bloco e avana para a final.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E7

programme.title: Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E8

programme.title: Kevin discorda dos BladeBreakers especialmente Ray e desafia Ray para uma batalha. Tyson j teve o suficiente e luta com Kevin, mas ele cai rapidamente na capacidade do Bey de balanar e se multiplicar.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E10

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E11

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E12

programme.title: a manh das meias-finais do Asian Beyblade Tournament e Tyson consegue dormir. O resto do time sai cedo, mas Ray fica para trs para garantir que Tyson acorde.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E19

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E20
